name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Saves the Day
name_original: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Saves the Day
description: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Saves the Day (released as Tiny Toon Adventures in Japan) is the first Tiny Toon Adventures game released on the Nintendo Game Boy Color. It was released on June 30, 2001 in Japan and July 30, 2001 in United States and was developed by Warthog and published by Conspiracy Games.
